episodes.title: Mao Zedong – The Cult of a Revolutionary | SLICE WHO
episodes.description:
In 1966, Mao Zedong launched the Cultural Revolution — a movement that would reshape China and divide the world.
To millions, he was a savior. To others, a dictator who unleashed chaos in the name of purity.
Through the eyes of those who lived inside Mao’s China — and Western idealists who admired him from afar — this film explores how belief turned into blind devotion.
From the classrooms of Beijing to the protests of Paris, Mao became an icon of both revolution and terror.
A portrait of the man who sought to remake humanity — and the price of his dream.

Documentary : Inside Mao's China
Direction : Nina Adler
Production : Sagamedia, MDR, ARTE  2016
